pullrequest.title: Suppress cpplint warning about whitespace with function pointers

content.html:
What I meant to say is that the regex is too broad. For example, the following would have been flagged before this pull request but is now ignored:

diff -r 1b993a7f6d0d src/SystemPaths_TEST.cc
--- a/src/SystemPaths_TEST.cc   Tue Jun 12 19:20:17 2018 -0700
+++ b/src/SystemPaths_TEST.cc   Thu Jun 14 09:09:31 2018 -0700
@@ -41,7 +41,7 @@
       if (getenv("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH"))
         this->backupPluginPath += getenv("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH");

-      putenv(const_cast<char*>("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH="));
+      putenv (const_cast<char*>("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH="));
     }

   public: virtual void TearDown()

It's not a huge deal, but I wanted to point it out
